Method/Description - Testing trench foundation material to assess is undercut is required. Scala penetrometer test as per NZS4402.6.5.2:1988 for non-cohesive materials. Table 18
○ The CBR value of the subgrade soils shall also be measured using the in-situ CBR test in accordance with NZS4402 Test 6.1.3.
Test frequency - 2 nos. Dynamic Cone Penetrometer tests / 5m of trench, 1 per ancillary structure
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Dynamic Cone Penetrometer Test Report
Method/Description - 1.5m benches to be constructed starting from rock face

2.2.1 - Construction of embedment, bed, haunch using AP20
Method/Description - DI (Density Index) applied to cohesionless material
Test frequency - Two test “sets” per layer, 10m evenly spaced intervals on combined lifts upto 300mm lift
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test Report
2.2.2 - Construction of embedment side zones using AP20
Method/Description - Test 4.2.1 Nuclear Densometer Direct Mode or NZS 4407:1991 or Test 4.2.2 Nuclear Densometer Backscatter Mode and NZS 4407:1991;
Test frequency - Two test “sets” per layer, 10m evenly spaced intervals on combined lifts upto 300mm lift
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test Report
Method/Description - Test 4.2.1 Nuclear Densometer Direct Mode or NZS 4407:1991 or Test 4.2.2 Nuclear Densometer Backscatter Mode and NZS 4407:1991; Undrained shear Strength
Test frequency - 1no NDM and 1no Shear Vane Test per 20m max canters at 300mm lifts
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - NDM Test Report
Method/Description - Visual test prior to backfill above the side zones – line and level, correct installation, and joints are all sealed.
Test frequency - Review every 10m and witness every 25m
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report

Method/Description - Wingwalls shall be constructed on a compacted, 150 mm layer of AP65 granular material. Jointing between the connecting pipe and the back of the wingwall shall be completed using mass concrete.
○ Visual inspection of joints between pipe and wingwall
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report, Onsite Check sheet

Method/Description - Antiseep collars to be embedded 200mm horizontally into side of trench and 400mm below base of trench. To be located every second pipe joint. The collars shall be constructed using 25 MPa concrete.
Test frequency - Each Anti Seep Collar
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - DSR Inspection (Pre-Pour), Pre-Pour Check sheet, Concrete Dockets, Concrete Test results
Method/Description - Cut off Toe to be embedded 1m (or note 4) from top of wingwall base, to be constructed as per IFC Drawings
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Pre-Pour Check sheet, Detail Sheets
Method/Description - DSR to inspect geotextiles before rip - rap is laid. Max drop heights to be adhered to when placing rip-rap
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Geotextile Installation Check Sheet
Method/Description - 25% embedment depth with meandering low flow path from void filled riprap. Spat ropes for CU-17
Test frequency - Review every 10m and witness every 25m

Method/Description - Constructed as per IFC Drawings

Method/Description - As built survey of coordinates and invert levels, structures, and pipe ends

Method/Description - Check conformance with the specification and assess the asset condition post construction
Test frequency - For all pipelines > 225 mm Diameter
○ At completion of trench backfill of minimum 5 m fill prior to final surfacing
